title: Didn't get Noxus Icon
body: Hello everyone, I just completed the guest, it showed me that I get it but I do not. I have restarted the client 2 times but still nothing. {{item:3070}}

replies.body: I have it now , its been 2 hours but now everything is ok
Did you have to play another game to get it, or did the mission eventually "complete"?

> [{quoted}](name=Sinayion,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=R9bElBEY,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-02-07T23:31:11.262+0000)
>
> Did you have to play another game to get it, or did the mission eventually "complete"?

Hey man, I have reported the same issue here : https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/6WKqpKiT-did-not-receive-my-icon-reward-from-the-noxus-challenge

I did log back into my account 7 hours later following the issue and I found the icon. I did not play any other match after the one where I was supposed to get it. Either the issue was fixed or the the issue is some sort of delay before the icon is delivered.

Hope that helps.
Thanks for confirming the fix. Glad you got it :)

> [{quoted}](name=Sinayion,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=R9bElBEY,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-02-07T23:31:11.262+0000)
>
> Did you have to play another game to get it, or did the mission eventually "complete"?

No it appear after 2 hours. I have been out for a walk and when I came back to play more it appeared :D  , but in this time the game, my laptop was shut down.
This is "good", because we had issues with that mission, and that's the expected behaviour after our fix. Thanks for confirming.

wait what
where is that icon tell me guys
Yeah i didn't get it either. Don't really know whats going on with that.
